title: Tom Girardi faced more than 150 complaints before State Bar took action, records show
dc:creator: Harriet Ryan, Matt Hamilton
description: In response to a petition from The Times, the State Bar revealed it had received more than 200 complaints against Tom Girardi yet long kept quiet.
content:encoded: In response to a petition from The Times, the State Bar revealed it had received more than 200 complaints against Tom Girardi yet long kept quiet.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA JUNE 26, 2014 --- Plaintiff's attorney Thomas Girardi presents closing arguments in the trial of Bryan Stow's lawsuit against former Dodgers owner Frank McCourt and Los Angeles Dodgers LLC. The San Francisco Giants fan alleges the franchise was negligent for not having enough security to prevent an attack on him by Dodger fans that left him in a coma.(Irfan Khan / Los Angeles Times)
